channel.title: Needing help (reward:rep++-twice)
channel.description:
ok heres my problem i got this source, and its the gangsta source and i done lots of things to it, but theres one thing im disapointed about.
there isnt that icon on the bottom right of the screen when you go into the wildy with the skull and the wildy lvl.
on the source it doesnt say anything but theres wildy lvls like a lvl 3 goes into the wildy you attack but it says you must be in a higher lvl but theres no icon indicating the wildy lvl.
reward:rep++ twice
please and ty =)
